Package org.pepstock.charba.client.zoom

Interface IsDefaultDrag

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDrag, Drag
    interface IsDefaultDrag
    ZoomPlugin.ID plugin default options interface for DRAG element.
    It contains all default values for DRAG.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default String getBackgroundColorAsString()
      Returns the fill color during dragging.
      default String getBorderColorAsString()
      Returns the color of the border during dragging.
      default int getBorderWidth()
      Returns the width of the border in pixels.
      default DrawTime getDrawTime()
      Returns the draw time which defines when the drag rectangle is drawn.
      default ModifierKey getModifierKey()
      Returns the modifier key to activate drag-to-zoom.
      default double getThreshold()
      Returns the minimal zoom distance required before actually applying zoom.
      default boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true to enable element for dragging.
